result.eng: Are you are you at the airport?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú ag an aerfort
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ag an aerfort
result.html: An bhfuil tú ag an aerfortAre you are you at the airport?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ag an aerfortAre you are you at the airport?

result.eng: I'll meet you at the airport.
result.ga: Buailfidh mé leat ag an aerfort
result.orig: Buailfidh mé leat ag an aerfort
result.html: Buailfidh mé leat ag an aerfortI'll meet you at the airport.
result.ponchtml: Buailfiḋ mé leat ag an aerfortI'll meet you at the airport.

result.ga: Chuaigh sé go dtí an t-aerfort

result.html: Chuaigh sé go dtí an t-aerfortHe went to the airport.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé go dtí an t-aerfortHe went to the airport.

result.eng: I was delayed in the airport by three days.
result.ga: Cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfort
result.orig: Cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfort
result.html: Cuireadh moill trí lá orm san aerfortI was delayed in the airport by three days.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ moill trí lá orm san aerfortI was delayed in the airport by three days.

result.eng: I am going to the airport.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort
result.html: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfortI am going to the airport.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfortI am going to the airport.

result.eng: The course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ga: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.orig: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.html: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SathairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an cúrsa críoċnaiṫe tráṫnóna Dé hAoine agus beiḋ mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SaṫairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.

result.eng: Will you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFK
result.orig: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFK
result.html: An mbeidh tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFKWill you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú ag eitilt ó Aerfort na Sionnaine go JFKWill you be flying from Shannon Airport to JFK?

result.eng: This was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ga: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.orig: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráice
result.html: Rinneadh seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a bhfeictear na mílte saighdiúirí Meiriceánacha gach lá anois ar a mbealach chun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ seo in Aerfort na Sionainne áit a ḃfeictear na mílte saiġdiúirí Meiriceánaċa gaċ lá anois ar a mbealaċ ċun na hIaráiceThis was done in Shannon Airport where you see thousands of American soldiers every day on their way to Iraq.

result.eng: I was thinking about this on the bus to Newark Airport.
